Review Name: Wonderful Review Description: Review after 5 days of Installation. Product is working fine as expected, Below are pros and cons: 1. Cooling in less than 10 minutes(if input voltage is more than 200) 2. No humidity, No odour etc. 3. Remote with 'Night View' Cons: 1. Design of lower part of indoor units could have been better. 2. A bit noisy for 5-10 minutes when you turn ON the AC( may be because indoor &Outdoor temperature difference is more) And at last I want to say 'Installation' is done in very next day of delivery. Go for It!!!!!!!!!
